director.name: Hannah Lux Davis Hannah Lux Davis

introduction: Demi Lovato: Simply Complicated is a full length documentary that gives a personal and intimate look into Demi Lovato's life as not only a regular 25 year old, but also one of the biggest pop stars in the world.To know Demi best, you have to understand all that she has been through and overcome.This documentary includes never before told stories that inform the person she is today.Go on the journey with Demi as she creates her most important body of work in music yet, and discovers her most authentic self along the way.Directed by Hannah Lux DavisA film by Phillymack Productions
